posts.post_content:
Was able to upgrade this one (thanks Jim!) so selling this one, which is nice but has some flaws. $2600 shipped. Please pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if interested - thanks!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=409412&d=1594818565[/IMG]

One of my favorite baseball pics ever!

[quote name="mouschi" post=1999219]One of my favorite baseball pics ever![/QUOTE]

+1. It don’t get better than wagner and Cobb on the same card- it’s as though Wagner is literally passing “the all time best player torch” to Cobb; right before he beats him in the championship, of course

[quote name="Rhotchkiss" post=1999352]+1. It don’t get better than wagner and Cobb on the same card- it’s as though Wagner is literally passing “the all time best player torch” to Cobb; right before he beats him in the championship, of course[/QUOTE]

Very well said!  I was thinking all of this exactly and considered putting it in my last article.
thanks all for the kind words, will share the new one in the pickup thread. Bumping and price cutting to $2600.
Hi Pete, I'll buy this one, just emailed you. Thanks
